title: hosts webinar on COVID-19 vaccine accessibility tools
cleaned_text:
In support of the White House’s Vaccine Month of Action, Autism Speaks hosted a webinar in partnership with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the Autism Society of America, and the Autism Science Foundation to share information about COVID-19 vaccine accessibility for the autism community June 30.

Panelists from the partnering organizations shared the health impacts of COVID-19 on the autism community, the safety and effectiveness of the vaccine, and tools and resources for making the vaccine experience more accessible for autistic people.

Watch the webinar recording below or on our YouTube channel.

opengraph.title: Autism Speaks hosts webinar on COVID-19 vaccine accessibility tools | Autism Speaks
